title: Why do people hate Bernie Sanders for his speech? - Quora
tags: Politics of the United States of America

response.answer_text: If anyone hates anyone for what their political views are they personally have a real problem. There is too much emotion and feelings in politics today. It’s why people are treating each other so badly and giving them justification for hate. Politics should be discussed and debated and if no consensus can be reached agree to disagree and move on. Bernie Sanders has a left of the left progressive purview. He wants to change this country in so many different directions that it won’t be recognizable from what we have today. People don’t like it and as they have free speech they make no bones about it. I actually like Bernie’s style and his passion but I don’t like most of his ideas. He doesn’t either or he wouldn’t be a millionaire with three houses and he wouldn’t be traveling in first class or private jet. He would give most of his money to the poor, sell two of his houses and give his money to the poor and only travel by train or with the rest of us schleps in coach to save the planet.
